column2: Latest;Phnom Penh: A fire broke out in the 5th floor of a condo building due to a power outage from an air conditioner.------The incident  happened at 4:30 pm on May 15
column3: 2019 at the 5th floor of the buildingat 50
column4: Street 350 in Boeung Keng Kang III
column5: Khan Chamkar Mon.------Police said that before the incident
column6: a Chinese man staying there had locked his room and went out for several hours.------When he returned
column7: he saw the flames and tried unsuccessfully to put out the flames with a blanket.------ According to the source
column8: after being unable to extinguish the fire
column10: so the Chinese man ran downstairs and told staff to call the fire brigade.------A building supervisor took a fire extinguisher and managed to control the blaze before firefighters arrived.------Luckily the fire did not spread to other rooms and there were no injuries.
